# allMetadata

**Instance Property**

A dictionary containing all the metadata in the object.

## Declaration

```swift
var allMetadata: [AnyHashable : Any]! { get }
```

## Discussion

To retrieve metadata from the dictionary, use the keys described in [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/timed-metadata-dictionary-keys].

## Extracting timed metadata from a stream

- **key**: A key that identifies a piece of timed metadata.
- **keyspace**: The namespace of the identifying key.
- **timestamp**: The timestamp of the metadata, in the timebase of the media stream.
- **value**: The timed metadata.
